summary: Tests miss validating the exact genesis hash value, allowing an incorrect constant to pass.

issues.description: The tests only validate the format of SCORING_PATH_GENESIS_HASH but do not assert the exact expected genesis hash value, so a wrong constant could still pass.
issues.explanation: The genesis hash is a fixed constant (SHA-256 of empty string). Asserting the exact value ensures incorrect constants do not pass while still meeting the acceptance criteria.
